name: hocus
description:
hocus. is a minimal perspective illusion puzzle based on M.C. Escher drawings and impossible shapes.
See mobile version: https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/hocus./id1030548464

Create and share your levels as a card or code Relaxing music & sounds 100% indie - designed and developed by a puzzle lover Mouse and gamepad controls 65 Beautifully crafted mind bending levels (new levels are coming...) Optimized for PC and human brains
